column1: %s Index process is working now. Please try run this process later.
column2: %s Indeksiranje je u tijeku. Molim probajte ovaj proces kasnije.

column1: Click here to go to Cache Management and refresh cache types.
column2: Kliknite ovdje za Upravljanje privremenom memorijom i osjvežite tipove privremene memorije.

column1: Click here to go to Index Management and rebuild required indexes.
column2: Kliknite ovdje za Upravljanje Indeksom i ponovno izgradite potrebne indekse.
Model indeksa bi trebao extend Mage_Index_Model_Indexer_Abstract.

column1: One or more of the Indexes are not up to date:
column2: Jedan ili više indeksa su zastarijeli:

column1: There was a problem with reindexing process.
column2: Došlo je do problema pri reindeksiranju.

column1: There was a problem with saving process.
column2: Došlo je do problema pri spremanju.

column1: Total of %d index(es) have changed index mode.
column2: Ukupno %d indeks(a) je promjenilo način indeksiranja.

column1: Total of %d index(es) have reindexed data.
